apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
BHTwitter:

>- Download Videos (even if account privet).
>
>- Download Videos from DM (hold the video cell).
>
>- Hide promoted tweet from timeline.
>
>- Enable voice tweet and voice message in DM.
>
>- Confirm alert when hit the tweet / like button. > >- Unlock Undo Tweets for free.

2. BHTwitterPlus:

>- Hide the "Who to Follow" section.
>
>- Skip Analytics URL (t.co) when opening a link in a Tweet.

3. TwitterAutoHighQuality: Autoload photos at the highest quality available (up to 4K if possible). It also adds an option to upload 4K images.
apps.name: BHTwitter Plus
apps.subtitle: No Twitter ads, Download videos, Unlock Redo Tweets, Skip analytics URL... and more
apps.versionDescription:
1. BHTwitter v2.8:
    - Added Font changer feature
    - Added Auto load photos in highest quality feature
    - Added an button to copy user profile information next to their avatar.
    - Update FLEX to lasted version
    - Fix bugs in iPAD
2. Twitter v8.92.3
3. Remove TwitterAutoHighQuality because it's a feature of BHTwitter now.
